summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Neighborhoods; authorizing the execution of a grant agreement between King County Parks, Cultural and Natural Resources Department and the City of Seattle Department of Neighborhoods to accept $10,000 from the Youth Sports Facility Grant Fund on behalf of Groundswell, NW to be added to the existing Neighborhood Matching Fund award for the Webster Playground Project in Ballard, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
